item.title: Boxplot with trend line
item.description: Last week my colleague showed me a drawn graph and asked can we plot this kind of graph. It is a graph with grouped boxplot. Additionally, it contains a trend line that connects mean of each data box. So this post explains how to draw a graph like that using two ways; r ggplot2 library r base plots (using codes from The R Graph Gallery) This data is sample data set from my colleague.
